name: df-mvr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cmvr, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cv(s0), cmpt(s3, crab(s4, co(cn0, cmap, cv(s0)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s4)), cn), cfn)), cif(cfv(cur, cv(s1)), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s3), cmpt(s5, cv(s0), cif(nat1, nat0, wceq(cv(s5), cv(s2))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mVar =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà { s4 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]s0)|(`' s4 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶ if(s3 =(s5 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ if(s5 = s2, 1, 0)),(1r ` s1),(0 ` s1)))))
comment: Define the generating elements of the power series algebra. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
